text: geudeulgaunde ulineun gidoggyoindeul-ila malhaneun geudeulgwado hananimkke seoneun seong-yag-eul hasyeossnola geudeul-eun geu deul-ege gyesidoen geos-eul mang-gaghamae ha nanim-eun simpan-ui nalkkaji geudeul gaun de jeog-uiwa jeung-oga issge halila ha nanim-eun god geudeul-i haenghan geos-eul geudeul ege boyeo jusilila
